text: The Wooden Leg is a 1909 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithCharles Keil. A Companion to D. W. Griffith and stars David Miles, Florence Lawrence, and John R. Cumpson. ==Actors== * David Miles as Harry * Florence Lawrence as Claire * John R. Cumpson as Father * Arthur V. Johnson as Boyfriend * Mack Sennett as Tramp ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Wooden Leg
